version_description:
* Added International Airport
* Added Air Traffic
* Added 16 new theme (Total 48 themes)
* All Voices remastered and changed as English
* Added new speed and altitude indicator
* Added runway lighting
* Added Vasi Indicator
* Fixed small bugs
* Fixed UI Landing Gear Bug
* Fixed Perdovites Bug

* Added 12 International Flight Location
* Added 737 and MD-11 Airplanes
* All GUI Remastered
* Total 68 Airplane Paint themes
* Added Navigation and Beacon Lights
* Added Passengers, now you can see all passengers
* Added Takeoff and Landing camera systems
* Added new cockpit controls
* All airports unique and HD models.
* All airport vehicles changed to HD models
* Added new flight problems
* Fixed some bugs

Added original cockpits for every airplanes with high quality cockpits.
Added 4 new airplanes and Helicopter Sim.
Added 13 new levels (Total 25 levels)
Added smart flight assistance computer
Added more realistic flight dynamics
